instructions: Put the dinner fork on the left of the table cloth, vertically.
Put the dinner knife on the right side of the tablecloth, vertically.
Put the salad fork on the left of the dinner fork.
Put the salad knife on the left of the dinner knife.
Put the soup spoon on the right of the salad knife.
Put the dessert spoon at the top of the tablecloth, horizontally, pointing left.
Put the dessert spoon vertically on the tablecloth, right of the soup spoon.
Put the dessert spoon at the top of the tablecloth, horizontal and pointing left.
Put the dinner plate on the table cloth, right under the dessert spoon.
Put the bread plate to the left of the bowl of the dessert spoon.
Put the butter knife on the top left of the bread plate diagonally with the blade facing down.
Put the wine glass above the soup spoon.
Put the water glass between the wine glass and dessert spoon.
Put the napkin on the dinner plate.
